channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Capturing the Moment a White Dwarf Exploded
item.description: A research team has successfully imaged a nova in high resolution—and the images suggest that the nova was not a single, impulsive explosion.

item.title: The Search for Alien Artifacts Is Coming Into Focus
item.description: From surveys of the pre-Sputnik skies to analysis of interstellar visitors, scientists are rethinking how and where to look for physical traces of ali...

item.title: Dumbphone Owners Have Lost Their Minds
item.description: All my Gen Z friends want to ditch their smartphones. It’s cool. They’re cool. But there’s more at stake than they think.

item.title: The Best Streaming Bundles and Streaming Deals of January 2026
item.description: Here are the current best bundles from the most popular services.

item.title: How to Clean Your Keurig (and When)
item.description: Your pod coffee maker can get gross over time. Here’s how to clean it up.

item.title: Threads edges out X in daily mobile users, new data shows

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: ‘Physical AI’ enters the hype machine

item.title: Moxie Marlinspike has a privacy-conscious alternative to ChatGPT
item.description: Confer is designed to look and feel like ChatGPT or Claude, but your conversations can't be used for training or advertising.
